entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:57 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 3:48 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -46.1°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 60 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 39. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
